ygData.subject: FW: [eqenchanters] Re: FW: [eqenchanters] Skill Max??
ygData.msgSnippet: ah didnt know that...where did you find this info? do you know of other skills that dont follow the usual 5+level*5 ?? Skara ... From: Miller, Keith A.
ygData.messageBody:
ah didnt know that...where did you find this info? do you know of other
skills that dont follow the usual 5+level*5 ??
Skara

-----Original Message-----
From: Miller, Keith A. [mailto:keithm@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 2:07 PM
To: 'eqenchanters@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqenchanters] Re: FW: [eqenchanters] Skill Max??


From: "Miller, Keith A." <keithm@...>

This depends on the skill and class.

For example,

Enchanter weapon skills are 3*(level+1)

-----Original Message-----
From: DeGirolami, Franck [mailto:degirolami@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 3:58 PM
To: Eqenchanters (E-mail)
Subject: [eqenchanters] FW: [eqenchanters] Skill Max??


From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>


In all skills, as far as I know, you are maxed by your level. The
formula is
this: max = 5+level*5.
if your max is 65, you're probably level 12.
Skara
-----Original Message-----
From: lgivens@... [mailto:lgivens@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 1:24 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: [eqenchanters] Skill Max??


From: lgivens@...

Does anyone know how to get past the max. skill other than, 1)train at
guild
(told I am maxed), or
2)through use (used sense direction and other skills 100+ times and no
gain)?

Does this mean I am stuck with a skill of 65??

thanks in advance,

Enyen, Enchanter 4th Circle.
